articles.title: Ellen Jokes About Getting 'Kicked Out of Show Business' - The Daily Beast

articles.content: Ellen DeGeneres on Wednesday night spoke publicly about the devastating experience she went through amid allegations of a toxic work environment on her talk show, saying the last few years have taken… [+1998 chars]

articles.title: Burkina Faso suspends BBC, Voice of America for reporting on army killings - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: In a new report, Human Rights Watch said military forces ‘summarily executed’ 223 civilians in February.
articles.content: Burkina Faso has suspended the BBC and Voice of America (VOA) radio networks from broadcasting for two weeks over their coverage of a report accusing the army of the extrajudicial killings of civilia… [+2714 chars]
